classroom-assignment-grade.title: Classroom Assignment Grade
classroom-assignment-grade.description: Grade for a student or groups GitHub Classroom assignment

starter_code_url.description: URL of the starter code for the assignment

student_repository_name.description: Name of the student's assignment repository

student_repository_url.description: URL of the student's assignment repository

submission_timestamp.description: Timestamp of the student's assignment submission

points_awarded.description: Number of points awarded to the student

points_available.description: Number of points available for the assignment

group_name.description: If a group assignment, name of the group the student is in
